title: email-addr
description: The Email Address Object represents a single email address.

type.description: The value of this property MUST be `email-addr`.

value.description: Specifies a single email address. This MUST not include the display name.

display_name.description: Specifies a single email display name, i.e., the name that is displayed to the human user of a mail application.

belongs_to_ref.description: Specifies the user account that the email address belongs to, as a reference to a User Account Object.

type.description: Indicates that this object is an Observable Object. The value of this property MUST be a valid Observable Object type name, but to allow for custom objects this has been removed from the schema.

description.description: Specifies a textual description of the Object.

extensions.description: Specifies any extensions of the object, as a dictionary.
